Vision



FRED - Fire Resistant Extinguishing Device

A fire extinguishing system with autonomous and remote controlled features designed to
integrate with the existing fire safety system in the building, with an accompanying
adminstration dashboard and app ecosystem that provides analysis.

SDP 7, Locker 307, Floor 3 - Appleton Tower, 11 Crichton St, Newington, Edinburgh EH8 9LE

SVG Background provided by Hero Patterns
